ygData.subject: Re: Questions about lvl 18 song
ygData.msgSnippet: I believed the healing song goes up every 6 lvl. Your Friendly Rogue and Bard Hammerpaw and Samiam Champions of Norrath, The Rathe ... From: Tim and Mary Steed
ygData.messageBody:
I believed the healing song goes up every 6 lvl.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe



-----Original Message-----
From: Tim and Mary Steed [mailto:timandmary@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 7:54 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Questions about lvl 18 song


From: "Tim and Mary Steed" <timandmary@...>



>From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

>That's one of the real subtle benefits of the Bard class. Each and every
>one of your songs grows more potent as you level, and never becomes truly
>obsolete. There's a situation to be found for using each and every one.
===========================

J.M. Thanks as always for all your great info!!!

But are you sure that ALL songs improve as you increase level? To be honest,
I haven't done any testing in this arena. Sure, some are obvious (i.e.
Bellow damage going up every other level or so, etc). But some songs, like
the Healing song, seem to remain the same. Is it a subtle change, i.e. the
Healing song heals one more point ever 5 levels? Or is it supposed to be
something you notice from level to level?

Thanks again,
Tim
